snippet: Sergeant Major Plumley served in World War II, Korea and Vietnam and received the Silver Star, one of the more than 30 commendations during his 32-year military career.
abstract: Basil L Plumley, who served in World War II, Korea and Vietnam and received the Silver Star, one of more than 30 commendations during his 32-year military career, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Sergeant Major Plumley served in World War II, Korea and Vietnam and received the Silver Star, one of the more than 30 commendations during his 32-year military career.

headline.seo: Basil L. Plumley, Decorated Army Veteran, Dies at 92
headline.main: Basil L. Plumley, Veteran of Three Wars, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Basil L. Plumley, 92, Veteran of Three Wars
